summary: In a society where all social customs are based on the beauty of a woman, her challenge is to find self confidence and inner beauty despite having lost her physical beauty.
cast: Neda Amiri|Hasan Majuni|Payam Dehkordi|Ashkan Mehri|Maryam Boubani|Ramona Shah|Farnaz Rahnama|Roya Javidnia|Fariba Talebi|Fahime Ostad|Shaghayegh Ahmadi|Shabnam Shoarian|Elahe Hesari|Bahareh Rahnama
keywords: human face|personal relationships|dialogue driven|relationship discussion|disfigured face
title: Yek. Do. Yek
